import "./Write.css"; import PostBackground from "../img/car1.jpeg"; import { useContext, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Context } from "../context/Context"; export default function Write () { const [title, setTitle] = useState(""); const [desc, setDesc] = useState(""); const [file, setFile] = useState(null); const{user} = useContext(Context); const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); const newPost = { username:user.username, title, desc } if(file){ const data = FormData(); const filename = Date.now()+file.name; data.append(filename) } axios.post("/posts"); } return (
) }
